As the Amazon burns, Brazil’s Trump-like President who let loggers and miners destroy the land isn’t acting. Trump must not seek a trade deal with Brazil until Bolsonaro reverses his catastrophic policies and addresses the fires. We need American leadership to save our planet.

As a nation we must invest in education.

We need to raise teacher pay to at least $60,000 a year.

We need universal pre-K.

We need to cancel student debt.

We need to make public colleges, universities and trade schools tuition-free.

Playing it safe, according to the old rules is the most dangerous course we could take. It could cost us the election.

We must reject incrementalism and pursue the transformative change that the working families of this country are crying out for.

Tens of thousands of Americans die every year because they lack decent health insurance. There is no middle ground when it comes to heath care. We must guarantee affordable health care to every American through Medicare for All.

Right now in America, working people are getting squeezed. Wages have barely budged for a generation, but the cost of housing, health care, and education is rising. It's time to level the playing field. 

I’m running for president to make our government work for the people again.

RT @iPhilSomething Government is apathetic,  not us.   great talk with @BernieSanders aaaaand the crew. https://twitter.com/BernieSanders/status/1164910109098725376 QT @BernieSanders Some people say young people are apathetic.

Well, I have been hearing from young people all around the country. It seems to me like they are ready to transform America. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ECqP8RDXYAU-9-j.png https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1164900295215931393/vid/480x270/iq_QuAz-ieMItUBI.mp4?tag=13

Make no mistake, the Trump Trade War will soon hit California agriculture products—like almonds and oranges—with another 10% tariff. President Trump's ego is hurting American businesses. My plan for immigration reform will end unnecessary detention—but I’ll also enforce strict standards for medical care for anyone in our custody. The government has a basic responsibility to keep the people in its care safe and healthy. https://medium.com/@teamwarren/a-fair-and-welcoming-immigration-system-8fff69cd674e

Corporate abuse is rampant in America, which is why @katieporteroc and I introduced legislation to take on banks that cheat consumers and homeowners with predatory practices. A must-read by Rep. Katie Porter and @jehabig.
https://www.usatoday.com/story/opinion/2019/08/23/protect-workers-consumers-from-corporate-abuse-we-can-do-more-column/2060655001/

"Medical debt" and "medical bankruptcy" should not exist in the United States of America.

Getting sick is not a crime, yet our health care system acts like it is.

Every person in this country must be able to get the care they need through Medicare for All regardless of income.

Something that’s not getting talked about enough: HUD just proposed weakening anti-discrimination standards for public housing. This is completely backwards. We should be doing more to ensure equal access to housing, not less.

Hi Max, I hope I get to see you in North Carolina this weekend! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1165440407758606336/pu/img/Ih8C6RTYN13m5XQY.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1165440407758606336/pu/vid/320x320/GfTbhRq-0Bi65C88.mp4?tag=10
